name: advisory_information
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bart.
Tool description: The BART API gives you access to pretty much all of the BART service and station data available on the BART website.
API description: Fetches advisory information from the BART API based on command and optional origin station.

orig.description: Optional station filter. Uses 4 character BART station abbreviations (http://api.bart.gov/docs/overview/abbrev.aspx)
